entry.title: Sunday night: Periods of snow. Low minus 11.
entry.summary: Periods of snow. Local blowing snow early this evening. Amount 2 cm. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 50. Low minus 11. Wind chill minus 14 this evening and minus 19 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Sunday 23 April 2023

entry.title: Monday: Periods of snow. High minus 2.
